name: config
description: Views the configuration for this server
resetDescription: Resets a configuration key to defaults
viewDescription: Views the current value for a configuration key
editAddButtonsDescription: Sets whether or not buttons should be added on new suggestion messages
resetAddButtonsDescription: Enables buttons on new suggestion messages
viewAddButtonsDescription: Check whether or not buttons will be added on new suggestion messages
editAddThreadDescription: Sets whether or not threads should be automatically created on suggestions
resetAddThreadDescription: Disables automatic thread creation on suggestions
viewAddThreadDescription: Check whether or not threads will be automatically created on new suggestion messages
editAddUpdateHistoryDescription: Sets whether or not the updates should be appended one after another (maximum of 3)
resetAddUpdateHistoryDescription: Disables the update history from suggestions
viewAddUpdateHistoryDescription: Check whether or not update history is enabled
editChannelDescription: Sets the channel where I will post suggestion messages
viewChannelDescription: Check the current configured channel, if any
editUseCompactDescription: Sets whether or not I should use compact mode
resetUseCompactDescription: Disables the compact mode from suggestions
viewUseCompactDescription: Check whether or not the compact mode is enabled for new suggestion messages
editUseEmbedDescription: Sets whether or not suggestion messages should be within embeds
viewUseEmbedDescription: Check whether or not suggestion embeds are enabled
editUseReactionsDescription: Sets the reactions to be added on new suggestion messages
viewUseReactionsDescription: Check the reactions that will be added on new suggestion messages, if any
editRemoveReactionsDescription: Sets whether or not I should automatically remove message reactions on archival
resetRemoveReactionsDescription: Disables the automatic message reaction removal
viewRemoveReactionsDescription: Check whether or not I'll remove message reactions on archival
sharedValueDescription: The value for the configuration key
sharedSecondValueDescription: The second value for the configuration key
sharedThirdValueDescription: The third value for the configuration key
editSuccess: Successfully edited the configuration for this server.
editFailure: I wasn't able to save your changes, sorry :(
viewContent: The current value for that configuration key is: {{value}}.
